vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UpgradeabilityStorage.registry (Upgradeable.sol#51) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- initialize (Upgradeable.sol#74-76)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UpgradeabilityStorage._implementation (Upgradeable.sol#54) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- implementation (Upgradeable.sol#60-62)

vulnerability_findings.message:
Contract locking ether found in Upgradeable.sol:
	Contract Upgradeable has payable functions:
	 - initialize (Upgradeable.sol#74-76)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
